name: Mitigation Playbook for Command and Scripting Interpreter Incident
description: This playbook coordinates various actions to mitigate a detected malicious script execution attack.

action--dc5f2389-ef16-4d8e-bf75-874a11bd.name: Terminate PowerShell Processes
action--dc5f2389-ef16-4d8e-bf75-874a11bd.description: Kill all running PowerShell processes that might be malicious.

commands.command: for pid in $(pgrep -x PowerShell); do kill -9 $pid; done

parallel--395c64f2-3c86-41a1-8b30-575c50.name: Concurrent Mitigation Steps
parallel--395c64f2-3c86-41a1-8b30-575c50.description: Execute multiple remediation actions in parallel.

decision--e7b74ebf-188b-46e3-96f1-537e19.name: Check Compromise Condition
decision--e7b74ebf-188b-46e3-96f1-537e19.description: Conditionally change access permissions if the files are compromised.

action--3427c9bc-3b51-42e0-bf0e-90746dce.name: Change Access Permissions for Sensitive Directories
action--3427c9bc-3b51-42e0-bf0e-90746dce.description: Restrict access to sensitive file directories.

loop--f0b8e76c-77c4-4c78-9f81-83f09fdd1f.name: Scan for Residual Malicious Scripts
loop--f0b8e76c-77c4-4c78-9f81-83f09fdd1f.description: Repeat scanning until no malicious scripts are detected.

action--f0b8e76c-77c4-4c78-9f81-83f09fdd.name: Perform ClamAV Scan
action--f0b8e76c-77c4-4c78-9f81-83f09fdd.description: Scan the filesystem for malicious PowerShell scripts.

action--7a1f880e-c492-4b72-9a20-3f4c89be.name: Update Firewall Rules
action--7a1f880e-c492-4b72-9a20-3f4c89be.description: Deny remote command execution by blocking relevant ports.

commands.command: ufw deny proto tcp from any to any port 5985

action--1ddedf59-05e0-46e1-a5aa-ddebf3f2.name: Monitor Network Traffic
action--1ddedf59-05e0-46e1-a5aa-ddebf3f2.description: Capture and analyze network traffic for anomalies.
